column1: The mayor of Sainte-Julie is Suzanne Roy. There are eight city councillors
column2: all of which of members of La voix des citoyens — Équipe Suzanne Roy
column3: as of the 2013 Sainte-Julie municipal election.

column1: Sainte-Julie is part of the federal electoral district of Montarville
column2: which is represented by Stéphane Bergeron of the Bloc Québécois. It is also part of the provincial electoral district of Verchères
column3: which is represented by Suzanne Dansereau of the Coalition Avenir Québec.

column1: The South Shore Protestant Regional School Board previously served the municipality.

column1: The Sainte-Julie public transit system provides commuter and local bus services.
